Content.Text:
Let's prepare one dish at a time. What
should I cook now?
Follow a recipe
Just cook!

Did I make too much? I'll put the excess
in my bag and start preparing the next
dish.

Guess it won't hurt if I don't go with
the recipe this time.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>, it's obvious that you
cooked this pretty much at random.
<PAGE>
If I knew the food was going to be like
this, I'd have cooked it myself.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll say it bluntly, <MYNAME>: the food
today was bad. Real bad.
<PAGE>
I know you can do better than this.
<PAGE>
If you feel too tired to cook, just
leave it to me.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, it's not exceptional, but it's not
disgusting, either. Just ordinary. I
guess there's nothing wrong with that.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This tastes beautiful, my princess! I
expect no less from my dazzling wife. I
highly anticipate all future meals.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Simply delightful, my princess! To make
me enjoy food to this extent... I'm
truly impressed!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm flabbergasted. It's even more
exquisite than Clement's cooking!
<PAGE>
You've done a superb job! This calls for
an appropriate reward: a passionate
kiss, perhaps?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry for keeping you waiting! You're
hungry, too, right? Since I'm in charge
today, you just be a good girl and wait.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Shall we start? Dig in!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bon appétit!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you enjoy your meal, my princess?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That was a great meal.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear work calling me! You have a nice
day at work, too, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, it's easy to get sleepy after
lunch. Make sure you don't fall asleep
during work!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The rest of the night is just for the
two of us. Let's forget all about work
and enjoy it together.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You have a quite an appetite, today, my
princess. There's plenty more, so no
need to hold back.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Look, <MYNAME>, you can't leave food you
don't like on your plate! I carefully
selected each and every ingredient!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since both you and I have jobs, <MYNAME>,
I think it'd be better if we took turns
to cook, don't you agree?
<PAGE>
I have no interest whatsoever in
fighting over how to split the chores.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Do you like your meal, my princess? You
should, since I cook fabulously! My
secret ingredient? My love for you.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Back at home, I used to always eat with
my mother and my little sister.
<PAGE>
You can't imagine just how much girly
chatter I had to endure. Sometimes I
chose to eat alone instead.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Which reminds me... I wasn't picky about
food as a child, but for some reason
it's got worse as I get older.
<PAGE>
After becoming a stylist, I began caring
more about what kind of food I eat. I
guess that makes sense.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>, don't you have any manners? Why
can't you eat without spilling on the
table?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oops, close call.
<PAGE>
I almost dropped my fork watching how
gorgeous you are, my princess.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm going to ask Clement to start a
cooking course.
<PAGE>
I want to make more and more exquisite
dishes for you, my princess.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Food's appearance is also very
important. It has an immense influence
on how you perceive its flavor.
<PAGE>
The food's color and taste, the bowl's
color, how a variety of colors are used.
The details are everything.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, <CHILD_NAME>, focus on your food. You
don't want to spill everything.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Now, <CHILD_NAME>, I don't want to hear you
complaining. Be a good child and eat
everything.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I want you to cook the next meal,
<MYNAME>. What do you say?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME>, help with the dishes after you
finish your meal.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, you and <CHILD_NAME> eat in a very
similar manner. Like mother, like child,
eh?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, <CHILD_NAME>, any requests for
tomorrow? I may even make it, if I feel
like it.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<CHILD_NAME>, you're spilling food on your
clothes. Here, clean it with this.
<PAGE>
You, too, <MYNAME>. Like mother, like
child.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now that you've finished your meal, go
out and play, <CHILD_NAME>.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Eat to your heart's content, <CHILD_NAME>!
But don't forget to appreciate the
flavor, too.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Speaking of which, <CHILD_NAME>. Do you have
any new favorite dishes, now that you're
all grown up?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It feels like <CHILD_NAME> has become a
different person. So this is 15 years
in the future, huh...

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME>, help with the dishes after you
finish your meal! And do some cleaning
as well, will you?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<CHILD_NAME>, you haven't touched your food.
Tell me the truth: did you eat some
snacks between meals？

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I want to taste other delicacies made by
<CHILD_NAME> as well. I look forward to more
of your cooking, <CHILD_NAME>!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I want you to cook the next meal,
<MYNAME>. What do you say?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME>, now that you've finished your
meal go and get some exercise. Studying
wouldn't be a bad idea, either.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Say, <MYNAME>... did you, by any chance, 
cook this at random?
<PAGE>
You don't have to push yourself so hard!
When you're tired, you can let me handle
the cooking!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>, don't you think this food tastes
a bit... weird?
<PAGE>
Oh, but it looks so good! Maybe it will
taste better next time, okay?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? You wanna know what I think about
the food? It tastes fine, don't worry!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, this food tastes great! Thank
you for making it!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This food tastes wonderful! If all my
meals taste like this I'm going to need
a new belt!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Aaahh, life is so awesome! I've got a
beautiful wife and she cooks me
delicious meals!
<PAGE>
Every time I eat from your food it
brings a smile to my face, <MYNAME>! I'm
so glad I married you!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Sorry to keep you waiting, <MYNAME>! Wait
just a little while, okay? I'll whip
something up really fast!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, help yourself! Bon appétit!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bon appétit!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Was it tasty? I hope you liked it!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The food was great! Thanks!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you going to work today, too,
<MYNAME>? Don't push yourself too hard!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, now that we've had a delicious 
meal, let's get back to work!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
After this fantastic dinner, I just want
to take a shower and relax. But first
I'll help you with the dishes.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You look lovely when you eat, <MYNAME>! I
could watch you eat forever and never
grow tired of it.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You should try to eat everything, even
if you don't like it so much. I'll do
the same when you cook for me!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's kinda fun to plan the menu for a
meal! What should I cook next time?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've been trying to cook better ever
since we got married.
<PAGE>
I want to cook many tasty dishes for
you, <MYNAME>! I think I've made good
progress!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's so nice to share a meal with
family! Everything tastes so much
better!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm still a little immature in my
tastes. My likes and dislikes haven't
changed at all since my childhood. 
<PAGE>
What about you, <MYNAME>? It would be
great if we had this in common as well!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ouch, I just bit my tongue. It hurts
so much... owwww...!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ouch, I just bit my tongue. It hurts
so much... owwww...!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like simple, home-cooked food. You
can't just kick back and relax when
eating that fancy stuff, can you?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a small restaurant near my
parents' house that serves this great
gratin.
<PAGE>
When I was little, I'd always eat there
when I got my allowance.
<PAGE>
Do you want to try that gratin sometime,
too, <MYNAME>? I'd be happy to share.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME>, don't look away from your food
or else you'll spill it everywhere.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Now, <CHILD_NAME>, don't be picky about food!
You have to eat everything!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, could you cook something for our
next meal? Please, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME>, don't forget to help with the
dishes after you eat!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, you and <CHILD_NAME> really are mother
and child... you look like twins when
you eat!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, <CHILD_NAME>, do you want to eat
something special tomorrow? I can try to
make whatever you want!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, <CHILD_NAME>, you got food all over your
clothes! Take this and try to wipe it
off.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh, you too, <MYNAME>. You're both so
cute, spilling food together!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Did you eat everything, <CHILD_NAME>? Now you
can go and play for a while.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here, <CHILD_NAME>! Eat until you're
completely stuffed!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
By the way, <CHILD_NAME>, did you start eating
some food that you didn't like when you
were smaller?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<CHILD_NAME> is so different now, all grown
up... so this is 15 years in the future,
huh?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME>, don't forget to help with the
dishes after you eat! Some cleaning up
would be nice, too.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, <CHILD_NAME>, you didn't eat anything
yet! Were you munching on some snacks
before coming to eat with us?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Why don't you cook more often, <CHILD_NAME>?
I want to eat more stuff cooked by you!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, could you cook something for our
next meal? Please, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, <CHILD_NAME>, now that you've eaten you
can go get some exercise. Don't forget
about your homework, either!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
This dish doesn't taste much like the
recipe, does it? I was kinda hoping for
something delicious...
<PAGE>
I wish you'd told me you didn't feel
like cooking today. I'd gladly have done
it instead.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
This dish has a... curious flavor. I
think I'm having palpitations!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Not too special, nor too shabby. That's
the kind of meal I can really get
behind!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, I see you've put some effort into
today's meal. It tastes very good, my
dear <MYNAME>!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hmmm, delicious! Your cooking is so
unique, <MYNAME>! I think I'm getting a
little heavier because of it.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This was absolutely delicious! I can't
wipe this smile off my face! Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Sorry for the delay! I'll try to make
something quick. You don't have to wait
much longer!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Shall we? Bon appétit!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bon appétit!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The food was excellent, wasn't it?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The food was excellent! Thank you, my
dear!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, dear, off to work again? Why
don't we spend the day together some
time soon?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm very satisfied, now. I'm even
thinking of taking a nap. What do you
say about joining me, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What to do, this lovely evening? If you
don't have any special plans, <MYNAME>,
let's do something together!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, you're eating with so much gusto!
That makes up for all the work! If you
want more, feel free to take it.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Common sense says you must eat anything
that is served. A balanced diet is the
root of all health.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I have a wonderful time eating your
cooking, and also when I cook for you,
<MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
It seems that even at my age, it's not
too late to awaken to the joys of the
kitchen.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I was living alone, I always used
to treat myself to a late-night snack
and drink after dinner.
<PAGE>
Therefore my specialty is snacks that go
well with drinks. Maybe that's all there
is to middle-aged bachelors like me.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
To share a meal harmoniously with your
spouse... one of the best things in
life. How I've longed for this!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
As I grew older, I started appreciating
foods with a milder flavor.
<PAGE>
Hm? I sound like a grandpa, you say? No,
no, I just reached an age when I can
enjoy the natural flavor of things.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ugh... food got stuck in my throat...!
Something to drink, please!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ugh... food got stuck in my throat...!
Something to drink, please!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I once interviewed an artisan who
specialized in making spices.
<PAGE>
I remember being awed by how spices
could make such a difference to the
food's flavor.
<PAGE>
That's when I decided to buy only the
best spices, regardless of price. Saving
too much compromises the food's quality!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I always feel like reading something
while eating. It's a bad habit from my
days as a bachelor.
<PAGE>
No, I don't do it anymore. I would hate
to make you angry, my dear <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME>, don't look away from the food
while you eat, or you'll spill.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<CHILD_NAME>, you shouldn't have such strong
likes and dislikes. Don't waste good
food!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I'd like to eat some of your
special cooking. Won't you make me
something special, my dear <MYNAME>?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME>, can you help with the dishes
after you're finished eating?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, you and <CHILD_NAME> look exactly
the same when you eat. You are, indeed,
mother and child.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, <CHILD_NAME>, any requests for
tomorrow? I can prepare something, if I
have the time to spare.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <CHILD_NAME>, look at you, all covered
in food. Try to get as much as you can
off your clothes.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>My dear <MYNAME>, you spilled the food,
too. You two give me a lot of trouble.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME>, you can go play after you eat,
as long as there's no leftovers.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME>, you should eat as much as you
can, while you're still big.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Say, <CHILD_NAME>, have you acquired any new
tastes along with your years?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Seeing <CHILD_NAME> this big gives me a
strange feeling... so this is 15 years
in the future, huh?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME>, can you help with the dishes
after you're finished eating? What about
some help with cleaning?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<CHILD_NAME>, how come you're not eating?
Were you eating sweets before the meal?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
So, <CHILD_NAME>, you cook really well. I
wouldn't oppose you if you wanted to do
it more frequently, <CHILD_NAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I'd like to eat some of your
special cooking. Won't you make me
something special, my dear <MYNAME>?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME>, after you finish eating, you can
play for a while. Or study, if you
prefer.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
My dearest <MYNAME>. Usually I wouldn't
say a thing, but... you struggled quite
a lot to cook this meal. Correct?
<PAGE>
When you are too busy, don't hesitate to
ask me to do something in your behalf.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Uhm, <MYNAME>, this dish is...
<PAGE>
Never mind. I have faced greater
hardship than this.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I am overwhelmed by the sublime
presentation of this dish. I am
confident that it also tastes heavenly.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The meal is delightful, dearest <MYNAME>.
I am already looking forward to the day
you cook it again.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is superb! Even if I try not making
a biased judgment as your husband, you
are still the best cook in town.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is outstanding cooking! It owes
nothing in flavor even to the best cook
of my homeland's palace.
<PAGE>
I am truly blessed to be able to eat
such magnificent food.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I will prepare the meal, today. Please
be patient and wait a few moments until
it is ready.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I apologize for making you wait. Please
help yourself.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I am deeply thankful for this meal.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hope you appreciated the meal.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Everything was superb.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My dearest <MYNAME>, you are going to work
so early today! If you feel sleepy,
please try to rest for a while.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dearest <MYNAME>, will you be able to join
me for dinner today?
<PAGE>
I'll wait eagerly for your safe return.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you tired, my dearest <MYNAME>? If so,
please let me know if you would like a
massage.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Time goes by incredibly fast when you
share a meal with your beloved.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
It is not commendable to be overly
selective about food. Please eat
everything you find on your plate.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love to indulge my beloved one with
delicacies. May I always be able to do
so.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I have some confidence in my cooking
skills. If there is something you would
like, I will prepare it for you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Back when I lived at the palace, I would
always eat in the dining hall with the
other servants.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>On those days with a popular menu the
dining hall became a battlefield. Just
the memory of it makes me sigh.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I started working at the palace,
the pressure of the job made me eat many
sweet delicacies.
<PAGE>
Thanks to that, I've cultivated quite
the sweet tooth.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Dearest <MYNAME>, there is some leftover
food on your finger. Allow me to take it
off.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Dearest <MYNAME>, there is some leftover
food on your finger. Allow me to take it
off.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wish one day we'll be able to visit
each other's homelands.
<PAGE>
I would be delighted to experience one
day in your hometown with you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I tend to not hear someone calling me
while I am cooking.
<PAGE>
I have been warned about this by Master
Amir several times, but I cannot seem to
help it. It's quite embarrassing.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My dear <CHILD_NAME>, please stay focused on
your plate or you'll make a mess.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<CHILD_NAME>, my child, please restrain from
having extreme likes and dislikes and
try to eat everything.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
For the next meal, I would be delighted
to have something prepared by you, my
dearest <MYNAME>. Will you?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME>, would you please help with the
dishes afterwards?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, <CHILD_NAME>'s resemblance to you
during meals is uncanny. You two are
certainly mother and child.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My dearest <MYNAME>, do you or <CHILD_NAME> have
special requests for tomorrow's meals?
I will gladly prepare anything you ask.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My precious <CHILD_NAME>, you have let some
food fall on your attire. Use this to
clean it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>My dearest <MYNAME>, you have done the
same. You are truly so similar to each
other.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME>, one you have finished eating

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, <CHILD_NAME>, eat your fill while you
are big.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
While on the food subject. <CHILD_NAME>, have
you developed any new tastes now that
you have grown up a bit?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Seeing our <CHILD_NAME> growing up makes me
feel quite strange.
<PAGE>
So this is what <CHILD_NAME> will be like in
15 years.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dear <CHILD_NAME>, would you please help with
the dishes afterwards? And perhaps with
cleaning, too?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<CHILD_NAME>, what is the reason for your lack
